com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl

Class SqliteModelFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl.SqliteModelFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelFactory

    public class SqliteModelFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelFactory

    This is an implementation of ModelFactory for processing SqliteResult queries.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 02/20/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Detail

      • createFromResult

        public <T> T createFromResult(ResultSet result,
                     java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
        Description copied from interface: ModelFactory
        Constructs a domain model instance and populates its fields from the given ResultSet. The precondition for this method is that the ResultSet is currently at the row to convert to an Object from the correct table.
        Specified by:
        createFromResult in interface ModelFactory
        Parameters:
        result - the ResultSet containing the row to convert to an Object
        modelClass - the Class of the Object being instantiated
        Returns:
        a populated instance of the specified Class

      • createFromCursor

        public <T> T createFromCursor(android.database.Cursor cursor,
                     java.lang.Class<T> modelClass)
                   throws ModelConfigurationException,
                          InfinitumRuntimeException
        Constructs a domain model instance and populates its Field's from the given Cursor. The precondition for this method is that the Cursor is currently at the row to convert to an Object from the correct table.
        Parameters:
        cursor - the Cursor containing the row to convert to an Object
        modelClass - the Class of the Object being instantiated
        Returns:
        a populated instance of the specified Class
        Throws:
        ModelConfigurationException - if the specified model Class does not contain an empty constructor
        InfinitumRuntimeException - if the model could not be instantiated
